verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No more in earthen vessels God's treasure shall then be, But in unclouded beauty Thou, Lord, wilt shine through me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Undimmed in that great vessel, The glory of that light, Illum'ning with its fullness The earth in radiance bright.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}A golden vessel glorious, That all who see adore God in the Lamb in glory Expressed forevermore.{/lang-eng}
